mutation_log.mutation_intent: Replace box-based fire grid with ArcGIS JavaScript API for geospatial accuracy
mutation_log.observed_behavior: Build process terminates with bus error during npm build phase
mutation_log.expected_behavior: Successful build with interactive ArcGIS map rendering California counties and fire overlays
mutation_log.contradiction_hypothesis: Complex dependency tree of @arcgis/core conflicts with Next.js static export, causing memory overflow in build environment

mutation_log.mutation_intent: Switch from npm package to CDN-based ArcGIS loading with dynamic imports
mutation_log.observed_behavior: AWS Amplify build failure, local build hangs with bus error
mutation_log.expected_behavior: Dynamic script loading resolves SSR conflicts, enables static site generation
mutation_log.contradiction_hypothesis: Dynamic import patterns still trigger build-time evaluation, SSR/client hydration mismatch causes compilation failure

mutation_log.mutation_intent: Replace ArcGIS with Leaflet + react-leaflet for better Next.js compatibility
mutation_log.observed_behavior: npm install timeouts, dependency resolution conflicts, build system corruption
mutation_log.expected_behavior: Leaflet's lighter dependency footprint resolves build stability issues
mutation_log.contradiction_hypothesis: System-level instability affecting all external mapping libraries, not library-specific issue

mutation_log.mutation_intent: Fallback to simple county grid layout without geospatial accuracy
mutation_log.observed_behavior: Build succeeds, deployment successful, but lacks geographic fidelity
mutation_log.expected_behavior: Working fire tracking interface as baseline
mutation_log.contradiction_hypothesis: Success confirms external dependencies are root cause, but solution insufficient per requirements

mutation_log.mutation_intent: Implement Google Maps JS API with proper geospatial anchoring and local GeoJSON
mutation_log.observed_behavior: Bus error during build, complete system instability
mutation_log.expected_behavior: Google Maps provides robust geospatial platform with county boundaries and fire overlays
mutation_log.contradiction_hypothesis: Google Maps TypeScript definitions and complex API surface trigger same system-level failures as other mapping libraries

mutation_log.mutation_intent: Zero-dependency HTML5 Canvas with embedded coordinate math
mutation_log.observed_behavior: Build succeeds locally but AWS Amplify deployment fails
mutation_log.expected_behavior: Pure Canvas implementation bypasses all external dependencies
mutation_log.contradiction_hypothesis: Canvas implementation introduces visual rendering artifacts - fire markers render but county boundaries appear as cluttered boxes

mutation_log.mutation_intent: Fix Canvas visual artifacts with state isolation and coordinate validation
mutation_log.observed_behavior: AWS Amplify build failure despite Canvas fixes
mutation_log.expected_behavior: Canvas state isolation resolves rendering contradictions, enables clean deployment
mutation_log.contradiction_hypothesis: AWS Amplify environment has fundamental incompatibility - not code-level issue

loop_characteristics.invariant: AWS Amplify build rejection regardless of approach
